DataElement.preferredName: Disease Progression Examination Under Anesthesia Evidence Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator related to a patient has disease progression confirmed by inducing an anesthetic agent.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease Progression Examination Under Anesthesia Evidence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a patient has disease progression confirmed by inducing an anesthetic agent.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Cancer that continues to grow or spread.

Concepts.definition: A process that manifests as the worsening of a disease over time.

Property.preferredDefinition: A medical inspection, qualified according to the methods employed, as physical examination, radiologic examination, diagnostic imaging examination, etc., performed under conditions of patient's complete or partial local or general insensibility to pain with or without the loss of consciousness, induced by an anesthetic agent or by non-pharmacological anesthesia technique.:Knowledge on which to base belief.

Concepts.definition: A medical inspection, qualified according to the methods employed, as physical examination, radiologic examination, diagnostic imaging examination, etc., performed under conditions of patient's complete or partial local or general insensibility to pain with or without the loss of consciousness, induced by an anesthetic agent or by non-pharmacological anesthesia technique.
Knowledge on which to base belief.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
